articles.title: Japan averts technical recession as revised fourth-quarter data shows economy grew 0.4% - CNBC
articles.description: A GDP contraction for a second straight quarter may have muddled the case for interest rate normalization for Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda.
articles.content:
Japan averted a technical recession as revised official data on Monday showed the economy returned to growth in the October-December period last year, bolstered by strong capital expenditure.
